translation.en: -[distant piano music playing] -[distant applause]
Our target is wearing a captain's uniform. I repeat, a person in a captain's uniform.
translation.it: L'obiettivo ha un' uniforme da capitano. Ripeto, uniforme da capitano.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Bravo!
Come with me, Captain. Let's go find our table. The show's about to start.
translation.it: Andiamo al tavolo, Capitano. Lo spettacolo sta per iniziare.

translation.en: Goddamn! That is bright. I can't see anything in there.
translation.it: Maledizione! E accecante! Non vedo niente.

translation.en: [grunts] Yeah. It's like looking straight into the sun.
translation.it: Sì. È come guardare il sole.

translation.en: What the hell is he up to in there? I bet something nuclear.
translation.it: Che cavolo combinano? Sarà qualcosa di grosso.

translation.en: Remove your night-vision goggles. I repeat, remove the night-vision goggles.
translation.it: Togliete i visori notturni. Ripeto, tigliete i visori notturni.

translation.en: This better work, Mr. Know-It-All Vision Expert.
translation.it: È meglio che funzioni, Sig. So-Tutto-Della-Vista.

translation.en: Okay, fine.
-Set your tasers for max electrocution. -[device chirps] Let's take this asshole down hard.
translation.it: Impostate i taser al massimo. Distruggiamo quello stronzo.

translation.en: Hold on a sec. Wait, wait! There are multiple captains in there.
translation.it: Un attimo. Aspetta, ci sono più capitani.

translation.en: [chief on radio] Decoys.
Ugh, so devious. Go, go, go!
Pacify the captains! Our target could be any one of them.
translation.it: Placali! Potrebbe esserci il nostro obiettivo.

translation.en: No! No! Oh! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
[chief] Son of a bitch!
But they're just kids!
This is no time to categorize or pigeonhole people, Agent Steel.
translation.it: Non è il momento di classificare le persone, Agente Steel.

translation.en: Tase them all.
[agent] That's what you get for being a decoy.
translation.it: Ecco cosa succede a fare l'esca.

translation.en: -[agent 2] Do not move! Do not move! -[screams]
Well, well, well. [chuckles]
What have we got here?
I am Captain Tucker, and I am in charge of this vessel.
translation.it: Io sono il capitano Tucker e sono a capo di questa nave.

translation.en: What on earth are you doing here? -I demand answers! -Oh…
translation.it: Che diavolo ci fate qui? Esigo risposte.

translation.en: -[groans] -You'll get your answers all right.
You'll get your answers in a jail cell.
translation.it: Avrai le tue risposte in una cella.

translation.en: Well, uh, actually, we should probably read him his rights and inform him of the charges against him.
translation.it: Beh, dovremmo leggergli i suoi diritti e informarlo delle accuse contro di lui.

translation.en: And all that.
Oh, nice, Steel. That was a cool-ass line. Way to ruin the moment.
translation.it: Bravo, Steel. Che battuta. Bel modo di rovinare il momento.

translation.en: You wanna do that cool line again, Chief?
translation.it: Vuole ripeterla lei, la battuta, capo?

translation.en: Nope, nope, nope. The moment is gone.
translation.it: No, ora non ha più senso.

translation.en: Steel took that away from us.
Everyone, just… Let's just leave. Let's go.
Hello, sir. They got him. It's on again.
translation.it: Salve, signore. L'hanno preso. È di nuovo a bordo.

translation.en: [Captain Tucker] This is scandalous! Agh!
[reporter] It was just after midnight
police raided the Pacific Pearl and arrested Captain Herman Tucker
translation.it: la polizia ha arrestato il Capitano Herman Tucker sulla Perla del Pacifico

translation.en: on multiple charges of drug smuggling,
translation.it: con l'accusa di traffico di droga,

translation.en: trafficking, possession of illegal firearms,
translation.it: possesso illegale di armi da fuoco

translation.en: and slaughter of endangered animals.
-[student] Watch out. Pee incoming. -Ugh!
That's a good one.
Yeah, looks like I peed my pants pretty massively.
translation.it: Sì, sembra che mi sia pisciato nei pantaloni.

translation.en: Whatever, Fall.
[sighs] Yep, just emptied my bladder in my pants.
That's me. No, that's… It's good stuff. See you at the next, uh… Yeah. [clears throat]
translation.it: Proprio io. No… Fa ridere. Ci vediamo alla prossima. Sì.

translation.en: The prosecution is getting ready for the trial of the century.
translation.it: L'accusa si prepara al processo del secolo.

translation.en: But first, Captain Tucker is going to be isolated in prison,
translation.it: Ma prima, il Capitano Tucker verrà isolato in prigione,

translation.en: where should he for some reason pass away,
translation.it: dove se per caso dovesse morire,

translation.en: the district attorney would lose her only witness.
translation.it: il PM perderebbe il suo unico testimone.

translation.en: Oh, it looks like I peed myself, but, um…
I'm just the butt of a great prank. Don't worry.
-Oh… kay. -Yeah, it's not urine.
-Mm. -Oh, it's actually…
It's actually Fanta.
Whatever, Fall. Exam results are in. You should check 'em out.
translation.it: Ok, Fall. Sono arrivati i risultati degli esami. Guardali.

translation.en: They're here? Should I be excited or--
[sarcastically] Oh yeah. This is it.
This is the exam that decides your career, and you really stand out.
translation.it: È l'esame che decide la tua carriera e ti sei distinto.

translation.en: Really? Oh! [panting]
Okay. Here we go.
Fall, Fall. Duh-duh-duh…
Duh… No…
Ah, darn it.
[agent] Right…
Guys. Wow, I am just so proud right now.
We have helped rid the world of evil.
translation.it: Abbiamo liberato il mondo dal male.

translation.en: -Let's have some cake. -Fuck, yeah! Cake tastes good.
translation.it: - Mangiamo la torta. - Sì, cazzo! La torta è buona.

translation.en: Yeah, I just have this weird hunch. Am I the only one who thinks
translation.it: Sì, ho una strana sensazione. Potrebbe esserci dell'altro sul Capitano Tucker.

translation.en: there could be more to this Captain Tucker case?
translation.it: Potrebbe esserci dell'altro sul Capitano Tucker.

translation.en: Say what, Steel?
I just mean that… does everyone really believe
that one man single-handedly did all those horrible things by himself
translation.it: che tutte quelle cose orribili le abbia fatte da solo

translation.en: without anyone else on that ship knowing?
Right?
[chuckles] Just wow.
Could be a criminal organization running that ship.
translation.it: La nave può essere di un'organizzazione criminale.

translation.en: Captain Tucker could actually just be the tip of the iceberg.
translation.it: E il Capitano la punta dell'iceberg.

translation.en: Some kind of pawn. A patsy, a fall guy.
translation.it: Una specie di pedina. Un capro espiatorio.

translation.en: -You know what I think, Steel? -No.
I think it's actually time for you to shut your big yapper.
translation.it: Credo che sia ora che chiudi il becco.

translation.en: -Right on! -Can't you just enjoy this glorious win?
translation.it: Esatto! Goditi la vittoria e basta.

translation.en: Washington has been this close to shutting us down,
translation.it: Washington ci ha quasi fatto chiudere

translation.en: and now you come here with this… this nonsense.
translation.it: e ora vieni qui con queste sciocchezze.

translation.en: Yeah, what an asshole!
Fuck you, Steel! Fuck you to hell!
To be completely honest with you, Steel, no one likes a snoopy agent.
translation.it: A dire il vero, Steel, a nessuno piacciono gli agenti ficcanaso.

translation.en: Really?
All that sneaking around, gathering evidence,
retrieving lost documents, and finding witnesses
that could shed new light on a case?
translation.it: per far luce su un caso?

translation.en: Ugh. People hate that.
-But that's kind of our job though. -Our job was to crack this case.
translation.it: - Ma è il nostro lavoro. - No, era risolvere il caso.

translation.en: -And now it's cracked. -[phone vibrating]
Yes?
Mm. Unfortunate? [chuckles]
Roger that.
Listen up, team.
Captain Tucker just killed himself in jail.
translation.it: Il capitano Tucker si è appena suicidato in prigione.

translation.en: Suicide, Epstein-style.
What?
It's probably because he was torn apart by guilt.
translation.it: Forse perché era dilaniato dal senso di colpa.

translation.en: So the train has left the station. Case closed forever.
translation.it: Ormai è andata. Caso chiuso per sempre.

translation.en: In your face, Steel.
[chief] Oh! Yes. Oh. Let's go!
♪ Let's do it, let's do it, let's do it ♪
Yeah!
Hey, what are you doing with, uh, that evidence?
translation.it: Cosa stai facendo con quelle prove?

translation.en: You heard the chief. Case is closed. We're burning everything.
translation.it: Hai sentito il capo, caso chiuso. Bruciamo tutto.

translation.en: Yeah, just dumping it into the evidence destroyer downstairs.
translation.it: Sì, le butto nel distruttore di prove al piano di sotto.

translation.en: Hey, uh… Let me take that down for you.
translation.it: Senti, ci penso io a portarle giù.

translation.en: I'm actually heading down to the evidence destroyer right now.
translation.it: Sto andando al distruttore di prove.

translation.en: Great. Thanks. Uh, just don't take it home. -That's a federal offense, you know. -Ha-ha!
translation.it: Fantastico. Grazie. Non portarle a casa. È un reato federale.

translation.en: I know. I would never do that because that is not what I am going to do.
translation.it: Lo so. Non lo farei mai, perché non è quello che farò.

translation.en: -Far from it. -Great. Good to hear.
This will not be that one case I couldn't let go of
translation.it: Non sarà l'unico caso che non riuscirò ad abbandonare

translation.en: and eventually get totally Carrie Mathison-obsessed with.
Perfect.
No way, no, sir. Ain't happening. Not this guy.
translation.it: No, signore. Non succederà, non io.

translation.en: Too grounded for that stuff.
translation.it: Ho troppo i piedi per terra.

translation.en: Hi.
[radio DJ] Well, you're listening to 102.6 The Hawk,
and up next, we have a great tune from one of my favorites.
translation.it: e la prossima è una delle mie canzoni preferite.

translation.en: How can I help you, young man?
Oh, hi. Jonathan Fall. I… I called. Um…
translation.it: Salve, sono Jonathan Fall. Ho chiamato…

translation.en: Oh yes. Mr. Fall. Please come in.
Oh, I was just looking at my family on the wall out there.
translation.it: Stavo guardando la mia famiglia sul muro.

translation.en: Fall family has been roaming the seas for generations,
translation.it: La famiglia Fall è sui muri da generazioni, quindi,

translation.en: so… they expect nothing less from me.
translation.it: La famiglia Fall è sui muri da generazioni, quindi, si aspettano lo stesso da me.

translation.en: Let's see here. Jonathan Fall.
Ouch.
Okay, well, I know when you look at my grades, it… it doesn't look that great,
translation.it: Ok, so che se guarda i miei voti non sembra un granché,

translation.en: but the ocean is in my blood. It's in my genes, I think, so…
translation.it: ma l'oceano ce l'ho nel sangue. È nei miei geni, credo.

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah, my… my… my family was practically responsible for the Allies winning World War II,
translation.it: La mia famiglia è stata responsabile della vittoria degli Alleati,

translation.en: so not too… shabby. [chuckles]
translation.it: direi che non è affatto male.

translation.en: The thing is, you had the worst exams in the history of the Naval Academy.
translation.it: Il fatto è che ha avuto i peggiori voti della storia dell'Accademia.

translation.en: Right now, the closest you'll ever get to commanding a ship
translation.it: Per ora, la cosa più vicina a comandare una nave

translation.en: is turning tricks at the docks.
translation.it: è fare le marchette al molo.

translation.en: Oh, I don't know, I mean…
If there were guarantees that I would eventually command a ship…
translation.it: Se ci fossero garanzie che alla fine comanderei una nave…

translation.en: Just as a starting gig, maybe I--
I am obviously joking, Fall.
Yeah. Of course. [chuckles] Me, a hooker? No, I… I would never. That's, um…
translation.it: Sì. Certo. Io, una prostituta? No, non lo farei mai.

translation.en: I was just joking too. Just, uh…
two people in an office just crackin' jokes.
translation.it: Due persone in un ufficio che fanno battute.

translation.en: Anyway, you were saying?
What I can offer you is an extensive personality test,
translation.it: Posso offrirle un approfondito test di personalità,

translation.en: where you can show potential employers what you're really made of.
translation.it: in cui mostrare chi è ai potenziali datori di lavoro.

translation.en: Maybe you have some hidden talents
hidden deep, deep down there. Somewhere.
translation.it: molto in profondità. Da qualche parte.

translation.en: There. Done. [chuckles] I'm pretty sure I nailed it.
translation.it: Ecco fatto, sono sicuro di essere passato.

translation.en: Mm, there is nothing to nail. It's a personality test.
translation.it: Non ci sono votazioni, è un test della personalità.

translation.en: Hold on. I'll get the results in two secs.
translation.it: Le darò i risultati tra due secondi.

translation.en: Ooh, wow, there are some great ships here.
Could you send my test results to the Emperor of the Seas maybe?
translation.it: Potrebbe mandare i risultati all'Imperatore dei Mari?

translation.en: Is that crazy?
-[computer beeps] -Oh. Oh Lord.
-That good? -No.
But I owe it to your family name to get you something.
translation.it: Ma devo pur far qualcosa, lo devo al suo cognome.

translation.en: Oh! Ah, this could be an opportunity for you to work on that personality
translation.it: Questa potrebbe essere un'opportunità per lavorare sulla personalità

translation.en: and get some job experience.
And who knows what could happen down the line, Fall.
translation.it: E chissà cosa potrebbe succedere in futuro.

translation.en: Wow, that is awesome.
Thank you. Tha… Thank you so much, ma'am.
That is just a dream come true. Thank you for believing in me.
translation.it: È un sogno che si avvera. Grazie per aver creduto in me.

translation.en: -[foghorn blares] -[man over PA] Thar she blows!
That's on you, Mrs. Gilroy.
-That beautiful saggy ass distracted me. -[laughs]
translation.it: Quel bel culo cadente mi ha distratto.

translation.en: Oh, never mind. Those things happen.
translation.it: Non importa. Sono cose che succedono.

translation.en: -Hey, Tanner! -[Mrs. Gilroy chuckles]
Can't hear me.
Jonathan, darling.
Hey, Mom.
I didn't know we were having a party. What's the occasion?
translation.it: Non sapevo ci fosse una festa. Come mai?

translation.en: -Oh, it's your brother's big day. -Big day?
translation.it: - È il grande giorno di tuo fratello. - Ovvero?

translation.en: Yes, we're celebrating Tanner's 33 and a half birthday.
translation.it: Festeggiamo i 33 anni e mezzo di Tanner.

translation.en: Oh. Cool. I'll… I'll… I'll just get changed, and then I'll join in.
translation.it: Oh, fico. Mi cambio e poi mi unisco a voi.

translation.en: Yeah, about that. You know what? How about you just climb up in your treehouse,
translation.it: A tal proposito… sai una cosa? Perché non vai nella tua casa sull'albero

translation.en: and we'll bring you some food up there.
translation.it: e ti portiamo il cibo lassù?

translation.en: Your father and I thought that would be a great idea.
translation.it: Io e papà pensiamo sia perfetto.

translation.en: I totally agree. It's… It's just that I would really like to, uh, join the party.
translation.it: Sono d'accordo. È solo che vorrei unirmi alla festa.

translation.en: Of course, but I think it might be better for you to just skip it.
translation.it: Certo, ma credo che sia meglio che eviti.

translation.en: -So let's go ahead and do that. -Roger that.
Oh, Angela, you made it!
Hi, Dad.
Here you go. Chow down.
Ooh, thank you. So hungry. Good party?
Oh yeah. So great. So much fun.
translation.it: Oh, sì. Fantastica. Ci divertiamo molto.

translation.en: Skrillex is DJing later,
and your brother is sparkling like a star down there.
translation.it: e tuo fratello brilla come una stella.

translation.en: Oh. I bet.
May… Maybe I can come down and join in for a little while?
translation.it: Magari posso scendere e unirmi a voi per un po'?

translation.en: Just say hello to Uncle Herman and them maybe, just to get a little taste of the fun.
translation.it: Saluto lo zio Herman e gli altri, mi godo un po' del divertimento.

translation.en: Well, in an ideal world, it's exactly what you would have done,
translation.it: In un mondo ideale, è esattamente ciò che avresti fatto,

translation.en: but we don't want to risk you ruining your brother's big day with your presence.
translation.it: ma non rischiamo di rovinare la festa di tuo fratello con la tua presenza.

translation.en: What? Well, I wouldn't ruin anything.
I'll stay low, have a little friendly chat here and there. Yes?
translation.it: Non farei niente, solo qualche chiacchiera. Sì?

translation.en: Nope, not gonna happen.
Oh… Okay.
Oh. Oh. You're taking the ladder?
Oh, it's just a security measure.
Mostly to protect you from people climbing up and disturbing you.
translation.it: Per proteggerti da chi arrampicandosi ti disturberebbe.

translation.en: Don't want an old uncle to come up there
translation.it: Non mi va che un vecchio zio

translation.en: and have his way with you or anything like that.
translation.it: venga lassù e si diverta con te.

translation.en: What?
I'm not saying it will happen, but statistically, every family has a molester in their ranks.
translation.it: Non dico che accadrà, ma statisticamente ogni famiglia ha un molestatore.

translation.en: Yikes, okay. Um, well, thank you, I guess.
translation.it: Che schifo, ok. Beh, grazie, immagino.

translation.en: I'll put it back in the morning, I almost promise.
Oh, that would be great. Okay. Good night, Dad.
translation.it: Sì, sarebbe fantastico. Ok. Buonanotte, papà.

translation.en: Good night… you. [chuckles]
[Tanner, slurring] ♪ Know what I mean And do the little… on the catwalk ♪
translation.it: Sapete cosa intendo E lo faccio in passerella

translation.en: ♪ I'm on the catwalk, yeah I'm on a catwalk! ♪
translation.it: Sono in passerella, sì Sono in passerella!

translation.en: [chuckles] Tanner. So talented.
♪ Too sexy for my pants Too sexy for my… ♪
[partygoer] You're the best, Tanner!
[sighs] That's unfortunate.
Of course, Mr. Tyrant.
-Was that him? -Yeah.
He wants us to take a different approach this time.
translation.it: Vuole che adottiamo un approccio diverso.

translation.en: Instead of finding a captain with certain credentials, he wants us to find a captain with… none.
translation.it: Invece di un capitano con certe credenziali, ne vuole uno senza.

translation.en: Like a wet piece of clay with a license to command a ship.
translation.it: Un tizio con la licenza per comandare una nave?

translation.en: Yeah, I guess.
Let's get to it.
Muy bien. Vamos.
[Tanner] Yah. Coming through. I know the, uh, captain.
He's the kids' uncle, so move it.
translation.it: È lo zio dei ragazzi. Spostatevi. Ehi, salutate vostro zio, ragazzi.

translation.en: -Hey, say hello to your uncle, kids. -Uncle?
translation.it: È lo zio dei ragazzi. Spostatevi. Ehi, salutate vostro zio, ragazzi. Zio?

translation.en: Just messing with you.
I'm trying to bang their mother, and she made me take them to the park.
translation.it: Voglio farmi la loro madre e dovevo portarli qui.

translation.en: -Can you believe that? -What?
What, what? If you don't wanna know the truth,
stop listening in on other people's conversations.
translation.it: Non ascoltate le conversazioni degli altri.

translation.en: I think he… Honestly, I think this one's slow.
translation.it: Credo che lui abbia dei problemi.

translation.en: Here. Why don't you go on the ride? Thank you.
Insane birthday party, huh?
I had, like, six beers. I'm hungover like a mofo.
translation.it: Ho bevuto sei birre. Ho un sacco di postumi.

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah, it got totally outta hand.
translation.it: Sì, mi è sfuggita di mano.

translation.en: Fucked three chicks, or hens, or whatever.
translation.it: Ho scopato tre pollastre, galline o altro.

translation.en: I thought there were mostly senior citizens there last night.
What can I say?
I like the taste of raisins just as good as grapes.
translation.it: Mi piace il sapore dell'uva passa.

translation.en: Okay.
Anyway, I can't believe I'm finally 33 and a half.
translation.it: Comunque, non posso credere di avere 33 anni e mezzo.

translation.en: Wow, time flies when you're doing great and having tons of fun at the same time,
translation.it: Il tempo vola quando sei un grande e ti diverti un sacco allo stesso tempo,

translation.en: both at work and in private.
translation.it: sia al lavoro che in privato.

translation.en: Sure… Sure. Yes, I get it.
Hey, what's wrong with this ride? Can't it go any faster?
translation.it: Ehi, cosa c'è che non va? Non può andare più veloce?

translation.en: Well, this is as fast as I am allowed to take this… old lady.
translation.it: È il massimo a cui posso portare questa vecchia signora.

translation.en: Come on, Tiny J.
You know I'm a real captain, right? I could order you if I wanted to.
translation.it: Sai che sono un vero capitano. Potrei darti ordini.

translation.en: Ah, I… [chuckling] I don't think you could do that.
translation.it: Non credo che tu possa farlo.

translation.en: Oh. Oh, you wanna test me? Do you?
translation.it: - Mi metti alla prova? Eh? - No.

translation.en: -No. -Do you seriously wanna test me?
-I really don't-- -I hereby commandeer this ship.
translation.it: - Non… - Ora comando io la nave.

translation.en: [Jonathan] No!
God, Jonathan! That was so dangerous!
[woman] Where's my baby?
[man over PA] Thar she blows!
Okay. Well, okay. And now my clothes are wet.
translation.it: Ok. Va bene. E ora ho i vestiti bagnati.

translation.en: Jonathan Fall, you have shown a lack of responsibility,
and I have no choice but to remove you of your stripe.
translation.it: e non ho altra scelta che rimuoverti dall'incarico.

translation.en: -Please, sir. You can't do this. -[grunts]
-Well, I just did! -[distant sirens wailing]
Darn, that hurts.
Mom?
Dad?
Anyone home?
Mom? Dad?
Hello?
Anyone in here? No. Where are you guys?
-Hel… Oh! -[rhythmic clicking]
-[gasps] What the hell, Jonathan? -Hi.
You know very well what that metronome means.
It's lovemaking at a BPM that makes us come at the exact same second.
translation.it: È impostato a un ritmo che ci fa venire nello stesso secondo.

translation.en: Yes, I know. Sorry, I… I know.
translation.it: Sì, lo so. Scusate, lo so.

translation.en: Well? What?
[sighs] It's just that I was, uh, demoted at work, and, um… I was just wondering
translation.it: È solo che sono stato retrocesso al lavoro e mi chiedevo

translation.en: if you could speak to Tanner
translation.it: se poteste parlare di me con Tanner

translation.en: about me maybe getting some work experience on his ship.
translation.it: se poteste parlare di me con Tanner e farmi lavorare sulla sua nave.

translation.en: -He… He won't listen to me. -On Tanner's ship?
translation.it: Non mi ascolta. Sulla nave di Tanner?

translation.en: Is that how you wanna live your life, taking handouts to get what you want?
translation.it: È così che vuoi vivere? Elemosinando ciò che vorresti?

translation.en: Not working for it? I don't think so.
-That's not how the Fall family works. -[lube squelches]
translation.it: La famiglia Fall non funziona così.

translation.en: No way.
Jonathan, darling.
Yes, Mom?
Why don't you get out of the room so that your father and I can finish?
translation.it: Perché non te ne vai, così noi due possiamo finire?

translation.en: No offense, but your presence is a huge, huge turnoff.
translation.it: Senza offesa, ma la tua presenza mi toglie tutta la libido.

translation.en: Yes! Now, get the hell out!
-[metronome clicking] -Jesus. There we go. [grunts softly]
Oh, you're s… Okay, yes. That's… That's my cue. [chuckles]
translation.it: Oh, siete… Ok, sì. È il mio segnale.

translation.en: Okay. We're here.
Oh, and Liza, try not to attract any attention please.
translation.it: Oh, e Liza, cerca di non attirare l'attenzione.

translation.en: -Just quick in and out, hmm? -Sure thing, Pedro.
translation.it: - Entra e esci velocemente. - Certo, Pedro.

translation.en: You know me. I'll be discreet.
So what can I do for you?
My employer is looking for a captain for a high-end cruise ship.
translation.it: Il mio principale cerca un capitano per una nave da crociera di lusso.

translation.en: Perfect. We have some of the best candidates in the country.
translation.it: Perfetto. Abbiamo i migliori candidati del Paese.

translation.en: Great. We are an unconventional cruise line,
translation.it: Fantastico. Siamo una compagnia di crociere particolare

translation.en: and we are all about giving everyone a chance.
translation.it: e vogliamo dare a tutti una possibilità.

translation.en: -Sounds good. -Yes.
So I was hoping we could start at the bottom of your deck and work our way up from there.
translation.it: Potremmo iniziare dal fondo e da lì risalire.

translation.en: So you want the worst candidate?
Mm… Maybe.
Well, the very worst candidate is a man by the name of Jonathan Fall.
translation.it: Beh, il peggior candidato è un uomo di nome Jonathan Fall.

translation.en: He was at the bottom of his class,
translation.it: Era l'ultimo della classe e ha tutte le qualità

translation.en: and he has all the qualities that you're not looking for in a leader,
translation.it: Era l'ultimo della classe e ha tutte le qualità che non si cercano in un leader. Come può vedere qui.

translation.en: as you can see here.
translation.it: che non si cercano in un leader. Come può vedere qui.

translation.en: Hmm. Gullibility through the roof,
extremely low on natural authority, alphaness, suspiciousness. Uh!
translation.it: estremamente scarso in autorità, machismo e diffidenza.

translation.en: -This seems like a great fit. -Really?
Wow, this is so great to hear.
I'm gonna make a huge deal about this and tell everyone.
translation.it: Farò un grande affare e lo dirò a tutti.

translation.en: Hey. Please, please, Mrs. Porter.
Discretion is of immense importance to my employer.
translation.it: La discrezione per noi è fondamentale.

translation.en: Are you kidding? I'm already making an Instagram post.
translation.it: Sta scherzando? Sto già facendo un post su Instagram.

translation.en: We have over 900,000 followers, so the reach is pretty spectacular.
translation.it: Abbiamo più di 900.000 follower, quindi la portata sarà spettacolare.

translation.en: This is bound to go viral,
and you and your employer will have your faces all over it.
translation.it: e lei e il suo datore di lavoro diventerete famosi.

translation.en: You know, I'm so sorry, but we can't have that.
-Ah! -Sorry.
Sorry. Uh, sorry. Sorry.
Shit.
Yeah, so, uh…
Sorry.
And… sorry.
Smooth, Liza. Very smooth.
Well, I'll be cocked.
[Alexis] Jonathan!
Darling!
Breakfast is ready!
-For me? -Yes, for you, my little scoundrel.
translation.it: - Per me? - Sì, per te, piccola canaglia.

translation.en: Johnny, good God, we've missed you so much.
-Since yesterday? -Yes, since yesterday. Did you sleep okay?
translation.it: - Da ieri? - Sì, da ieri. Hai dormito bene?

translation.en: Oh… Okay. What? What is going on?
Please, Mom, this is disgusting. Ya… Revolting!
translation.it: Ti prego, mamma, è disgustoso. Rivoltante!

translation.en: What? I am not allowed to tell my favorite son
translation.it: Cosa? Non posso dire al mio figlio preferito

translation.en: that I love him and miss him?
translation.it: che lo amo e che mi manca?

translation.en: What?! Love and miss Jonathan?
translation.it: Cosa? L'amore e la mancanza di Jonathan?

translation.en: I'm… I'm the favorite son. Dad, tell her.
translation.it: Sono io il figlio preferito. Papà, diglielo.

translation.en: Sorry, Tanner. We don't favor any of our children.
translation.it: Scusa, Tanner. Non privilegiamo nessuno dei due.

translation.en: But if I was to choose, which I won't, right now it would be Jonathan.
translation.it: Ma se dovessi scegliere, cosa che non farò, sceglierei Jonathan.

translation.en: [Alexis] Me too. If I had to. If I was pushed into a corner.
translation.it: Anch'io. Se dovessi. Se proprio mi obbligassero.

translation.en: Okay. What kind of bizarre charade is this?
translation.it: Ok. Che razza di bizzarra farsa è questa?

translation.en: You guys always say that you dread the day he was born,
translation.it: Dite sempre che rimpiangete il giorno in cui è nato,

translation.en: and that he's a loser, and that you hoped for so long
translation.it: che è un fallito e che speravate

translation.en: that there was a mix-up at the hospital, and you'd get your real child back.
translation.it: che ve l'avessero scambiato e rivolevate il vostro vero figlio.

translation.en: You always say that.
That's enough, Tanner. Shoo! Shoo!
You received this today from the Caribbean Queen.
translation.it: Oggi ti è arrivato questo dalla Regina dei Caraibi.

translation.en: You have received a formal job offer to be a captain!
translation.it: Hai ricevuto un'offerta formale per diventare capitano!

translation.en: -Wow. -What?
What? We're kidding. We're joking, right? [laughs]
Are we kidding? No? What are… You'll be the worst captain on earth!
translation.it: Scherziamo? No? Ma che… Sarai il peggior capitano della Terra!

translation.en: I don't get it!
It… It fits pretty great, doesn't it?
My beautiful boy, I'm so proud of you.
translation.it: Mio bellissimo figlio, sono così orgogliosa di te.

translation.en: Your car is here. Good luck… son.
translation.it: La tua auto è arrivata. Buona fortuna, figliolo.

translation.en: -[triumphant music continues] -Put that silly hand away. Get in here. Oh yeah.
translation.it: Metti via quella stupida mano. Vieni qui. Oh, sì.

translation.en: [gasps] It's happening.
Oh, damn. That's a warm and loving hug.
translation.it: Cavolo. È un abbraccio caldo e affettuoso.

translation.en: -Your turn, Alexis. -Huh. Oh…
-Go on. You can do this. -Yes, I know how to hug.
translation.it: - Forza. Puoi farcela. - Sì, so come si abbraccia.

translation.en: -There it is. -[Alexis groans]
-So much love in the room. -[Alexis] Mm.
So much.
Okay, yeah.
Morning, Captain. Let me take that for you.
Oh, thank you very much. That's, uh, me, Captain. [chuckles]
translation.it: Grazie mille. Sono io, il Capitano.

translation.en: -[Blake] Bye-bye, son! -[Alexis] Bye… -[Blake] Great hug. -[Alexis] …you!
-Bye, Mom. Bye, Dad. -Bye!
-Bye-bye. -Bye, Consuela. Oh, bye, Tanner.
[British man] Very well.
Very well indeed.
-You see that, Bon Jovi? -[cat meows]
That is my new captain.
translation.it: Quello è il mio nuovo capitano.

translation.en: The future of our enterprise.
